speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Michael calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Michael, I'm doing well, thank you. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm reaching out regarding your outstanding account. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Can you also confirm your address for security purposes?

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your cooperation. I see you have a balance of $250. How would you like to resolve this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can make a payment of $100 right now via credit card.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I will process that for you. Can you provide your card information?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. Your payment is being processed, and you'll receive a confirmation shortly.

speaker: Customer
text: Great, thank you for your help!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a wonderful day.
